mapper.insert: insert into t_tempcarteinfo (TCIID, TCISwiftNumber, TCIState, TCIdTableID, TCICustomerID, TCIMemID, TCIWaiterID, TCIDishNums, TCIAmountPeoplo, TCIRepastTime, TCIConsumeAmount, TCICostAmount, TCIDiscount, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy, TCIRemark) values (#{tciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciswiftnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tcistate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tcidtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcicustomerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcimemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciwaiterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcidishnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciamountpeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcirepasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tciconsumeamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tcicostamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tcidiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciremark,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
mapper.update: update t_tempcarteinfo set TCISwiftNumber = #{tciswiftnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCIState = #{tcistate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TCIdTableID = #{tcidtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCICustomerID = #{tcicustomerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIMemID = #{tcimemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIWaiterID = #{tciwaiterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIDishNums = #{tcidishnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIAmountPeoplo = #{tciamountpeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIRepastTime = #{tcirepasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TCIConsumeAmount = #{tciconsumeamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCICostAmount = #{tcicostamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCIDiscount = #{tcidiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCIRemark = #{tciremark,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where TCIID = #{tciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TCIID, TCISwiftNumber, TCIState, TCIdTableID, TCICustomerID, TCIMemID, TCIWaiterID, TCIDishNums, TCIAmountPeoplo, TCIRepastTime, TCIConsumeAmount, TCICostAmount, TCIDiscount, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy, TCIRemark from t_tempcarteinfo where TCIID = #{tciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select TCIID, TCISwiftNumber, TCIState, TCIdTableID, TCICustomerID, TCIMemID, TCIWaiterID, TCIDishNums, TCIAmountPeoplo, TCIRepastTime, TCIConsumeAmount, TCICostAmount, TCIDiscount, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy, TCIRemark from t_tempcarteinfo
